item.title: My Portfolio
item.description: I’m Almir Hadzic I like to code and play video games. Technologies Projects - RPN Calculator — C#, Avalonia — Github-Repo: github.com/pfrey-teaching/avaloniarpncalc-aHadzicHTL - Portfolio — Hugo, Asciidoctor — Github-Repo: github.com/aHadzicHTL/Portfolio - Test3 — test, test — asciidoctor.org This site was built with: - Hugo, AsciiDoc - Highlights: Responsive, fast, and elegant
This is a web project I worked on using Hugo and Asciidoc.
